title: Sri Lanka : Mahinda Rajapaksa NO longer Prime Minister; Gazette published
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); An extraordinary gazette was published late Monday (9) night confirming the resignation of Mahinda Rajapaksa, from the post of Prime Minister.
Sri Lanka : Mahinda Rajapaksa NO longer Prime Minister; Gazette published
